name: Bewitch the Pigs
description:
This is a Halloween themed Endless Runner with witches, pigs and sacrifice! Controls: WASD, Space Bar

Context: On the Halloween night, the witches go hunting. As they fly through the sky they dodge bats and ghosts, while searching for humans to transform. Transform into what, you may ask.... PIGS !!!!

-For every 30 sacrifices you win 1 life-

Credits:

Music: YouTube/@George Guilty

Art: Instagram & Twitter/@Annalou_Iza

Programming: Instagram & Twitter/@Foundtexas
